fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Douse a player at night.
- Ignite all doused players. 1 use.
- Spray down a player, undousing them. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If 3 or more Town are doused, you will also ignite yourself.
- You may douse and spray players in the same night.
- You only remove your own douses.
